title: France panorama. [No. 72/30]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: President Bourguiba in Paris - official state visit to France. Electricity Biennial - the 6th International Electrical Equipment Biennial. The Museum Train - innovation on the Paris-Marseille express - painting exhibits. 2. Holiday architecture - the new “marinas” of the French Riviera. 3. Film museum - the new film museum in Paris’ Palais de Chaillot. 4. Marcel Jouhandeau - portrait of a famous writer.
